definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: As she was walking down to the street, a white Rolls-Royce pulled up.
sentences.chinese: 當她下了樓梯，一輛白色的勞斯萊斯停下來。

sentences.english: FAW's HQD Concept is a scary-looking Chinese-style Rolls-Royce Phantom!
sentences.chinese: 一氣紅旗盛事是一款嚇人的中國版勞斯萊斯幻影。

sentences.english: Guests have access to a 24-hour butler and a Rolls-Royce on standby ($5,897; hongkong.peninsula.com ).
sentences.chinese: 有24小時隨時待命的男管家和勞斯萊斯供客人調遣。

sentences.english: Give me a quiet little country house with a big garden, not a mansion and a Rolls Royce.
sentences.chinese: 我要一所有大花園小房子，我不要大宅和勞斯萊斯。

sentences.english: The '09 Geely GE body design is no doubt a knock-off of the Rolls Royce Phantom.
sentences.chinese: 09款吉利GE的車身設計與勞斯萊斯幻影如出一轍。

sentences.english: Rolls-Royce includes Hong Kong in its China sales.
sentences.chinese: 勞斯萊斯在中國的銷售也包括香港。

sentences.english: An extended wheelbase version of the Phantom costs 8.2 million yuan, the company said.
sentences.chinese: 勞斯萊斯公司官方發佈加長版的幻影售價820萬。

sentences.english: The striking thing about Rolls-Royce, however, has been its success in foreign markets.
sentences.chinese: 但是，勞斯萊斯令人稱奇的是其在國外市場的成功。

sentences.english: Rolls-Royce has unveiled an electric Phantom at the Geneva motor show.
sentences.chinese: 勞斯萊斯於日內瓦車展上公開了其幻影車型的電動版。

sentences.english: Rolls-Royce double-R logo in addition, there are the famous trapeze signs.
sentences.chinese: 勞斯萊斯的標誌除了雙R之外，還有著名的飛人標誌。

sentences.english: When you driving Rolls Royce do you think of milage?
sentences.chinese: 你開勞斯萊斯的時候，還看安全里程？

sentences.english: Rolls-Royce has yet to set prices for the special-edition cars.
sentences.chinese: 勞斯萊斯公司目前還沒有爲這些特別版汽車定價。

sentences.english: The author of this piece did not discuss Rolls-Royce with either of them.
sentences.chinese: 本文作者沒有和他們兩人探討有關勞斯萊斯的問題。

definition: racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
one's own car (or motorbike)/vehicle for one's private use
enclosed carriage for carrying passengers/motor carriage/car or bus/limousine/CL:部[bu4],輛|辆[liang4]
